meta.Title: MEMORY PIECE [New York Times, Sunday, December 11, 1960]
meta.Author: Tom Mixon

down.question: Initials on a sheriff's writ, "not found."
Half of a famous theatrical duo.
N. M. pueblo near Enchanted Mesa.
Spot for toys, à la Hellman.
